variable.name: WTCUR_8
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: WTMAX_8
variable.description: Highest weight in past year lbs
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN_8
variable.description: Lowest weight in past year lbs
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: WALKSWK_8
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_8
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 min'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_8
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q4 'Walk more than 10 min'.
variable.value: Average or normal (2-3 miles an hour)
Very fast (more than 4 miles an hour)

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_8
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (you work up a sweat and your heart beats fast)? For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_8
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q5 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_8
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_8
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q6 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_8
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_8
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q7 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_8
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_8
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q8 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: WTLMERID_8
variable.comment: Meridia (Sibutramine)

variable.name: WTLXENCL_8
variable.comment: Xenical (Orlistat)

variable.name: WTLPHENT_8
variable.comment: Phentermine (Fastin)

variable.name: WTLOTHER_8
variable.comment: Other prescription weight loss medication

variable.name: CFINDP_8
variable.comment: Caffeinated coffee, either instant or paper-filtered drip (cups)

variable.name: CFOTHCFE_8
variable.comment: Other caffeinated coffee, such as perked, espresso or latte (cups)

variable.name: CFDCINDP_8
variable.comment: Decaf coffee, either instant or paper-filtered drip (cups)

variable.name: CFDCOTH_8
variable.comment: Other decaf coffee, such as perked, espresso or latte (cups)

variable.name: CFREGTEA_8
variable.comment: Regular tea (not decaf) (cups)

variable.name: CFDCFTEA_8
variable.comment: Decaf tea (cups)

variable.name: SODACF_8
variable.comment: Soft drinks with caffeine (such as Coke, Diet Pepsi, Dr. Pepper, Mountain Dew) (12 oz. Can)

variable.name: SODANOCF_8
variable.comment: Soft drinks without caffeine (such as Sprite, 7-Up, Diet Sprite) (12 oz. can)

variable.name: NATHOR_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any 'natural' hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, skin cream or soy-enriched foods.

variable.name: YAMCRM_8
variable.comment: Wild yam cream Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: YAMPLS_8
variable.comment: Wild yam pills Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGCRM_8
variable.comment: Progesterone cream Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGSUP_8
variable.comment: Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: DHEAPL_8
variable.comment: DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone pills) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYPLS_8
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen pills or powder (soy or flax) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYCRM_8
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYFDS_8
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen enriched foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTOTHR_8
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTDNTK_8
variable.comment: Don't know Sub-question of F148 V1 Q11 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: OSTPL_8
variable.comment: In the past year, have you used any treaments for osteoporosis or other bone conditions that you get with a doctor's prescription? Examples are Fosamax, Miacalcin, and Actonel. (Do not include use of selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs) such as Evista (Raloxifene) which are covered in Question 13.)

variable.name: OSTALND_8
variable.comment: Alendronate (Fosamax) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTCALC_8
variable.comment: Calcitonin (Miacalcin) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTRISED_8
variable.comment: Risedronate (Actonel) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTPAMID_8
variable.comment: Pamidronate (Aredia) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTZOLEN_8
variable.comment: Zolendronate Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTPTH_8
variable.comment: Parathyroid hormone (PTH) (Forteo) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTOTHER_8
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: OSTUNTK_8
variable.description: Don't know what kind of osteoporosis medication
variable.comment: Don't Know Sub-question of F148 V1 Q12 'Prescribed osteoporosis meds'.

variable.name: SRM_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any non-estrogen prescription treatments for hormone replacement? These may be prescribed to prevent osteoporosis and breast cancer and are sometimes called 'designer estrogens' or selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs). Examples are Evista (Raloxifene) and Nolvadex (Tamoxifen).

variable.name: SRMEVST_8
variable.comment: Evista (Raloxifene) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q13 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMNOLU_8
variable.comment: Nolvadex (Tamoxifen) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q13 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMOTHR_8
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q13 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMDNTK_8
variable.comment: Don't know Sub-question of F148 V1 Q13 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: HRPST1YR_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE [also called PROGESTIN] that were prescribed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shots, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPLPA_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS or PATCHES prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill, patch, or package (for example, Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPDUR_8
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS or PATCH which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q15 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: EPTYPE_8
variable.comment:
Which combination did you use the longest? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q15 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: ETPL_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ETDUR_8
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q16 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_8
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q16 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: E_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any ESTROGEN pill, patch, cream or shots (other than the combination described in Qxs 15 and 16)? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPL_8
variable.description: Did you use any Estrogen pill
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen pill? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the Estrogen pills? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_8
variable.comment:
What kind did you take? (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind.) Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPCH_8
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen patch?
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen patch? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17.4 'Did you use an estrogen patch?'.

variable.name: ECRM_8
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen cream?
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen cream? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the cream? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17.6 'Did you use an estrogen cream?'.

variable.name: ESHT_8
variable.comment:
Did you have estrogen shots? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have the shots? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q17.8 'Did you have estrogen shots?'.

variable.name: P_8
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pill, cream, or shots (other than the combinations described in Quextion 15)? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: PPL_8
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin pill or capsule? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the pill or capsule? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_8
variable.comment:
What kind did you take (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind)? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_8
variable.comment:
How many days per month did you use it? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PCRM_8
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PCRMDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18.5 'Progesterone/progestin cream'.

variable.name: PSHT_8
variable.comment:
Did you have progesterone or progestin shots? Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PSHTDUR_8
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have progesterone or progestin shots Sub-question of F148 V1 Q14 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F148 V1 Q18.7 'Progesterone/progestin shots'.

variable.name: CATARACT_8
variable.comment: Cataracts(s)

variable.name: MACDEGNR_8
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: ASTHMA_8
variable.comment: Asthma

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_8
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_8
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_8
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: ATRIALFB_8
variable.comment: Atrial fibrillation

variable.name: KIDNEYST_8
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_8
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: STOMULCR_8
variable.comment: Stomach or duodenal ulcer

variable.name: DIVERTIC_8
variable.comment: Diverticulitis

variable.name: PANCREAT_8
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_8
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: OVRTHY_8
variable.comment: Overactive thyroid

variable.name: UNDTHY_8
variable.comment: Underactive thyroid

variable.name: ALZHEIM_8
variable.comment: Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: MS_8
variable.comment: Multiple sclerosis

variable.name: PARKINS_8
variable.comment: Parkinson's disease

variable.name: ALS_8
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: ALZREL_8
variable.comment: Has any member of your family (mother, father, full-blooded sister or brother) been dianosed with Alzheimer's disease or senile dementia?

variable.name: ALZMOM_8
variable.comment: Mother Sub-question of F148 V1 Q20 'Family with Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZDAD_8
variable.comment: Father Sub-question of F148 V1 Q20 'Family with Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZBRO_8
variable.comment: Any brother Sub-question of F148 V1 Q20 'Family with Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZSIS_8
variable.comment: Any sister Sub-question of F148 V1 Q20 'Family with Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: MARITAL_8
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.)

variable.name: TEPIWK_8
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 5, 6, and 7. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT_8
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4,4.1, 5,5.1, 6.6.1, 7,7.1. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK_8
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4.2, 5, and 6. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity.

variable.name: XLMSEPI_8
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6 and 6.1. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI_8
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categ)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6, and 6.1. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, question 5. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK_8
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment:
Computed from Form 148, questions 4,4.1,5,5.1,6, 6.1, 7 and 7.1.
Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK_8
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.2, 5, and 6. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK_8
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 5 and 5.1. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity).

variable.name: TEXPWK_8
variable.description: Total energy expend from recreational phys activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1, 4.2, 5, 5.1, 6, 6.1,7 and 7.1. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: FFWKEXP_8
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1 and 4.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP_8
variable.description: Energy expend fr walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 4, 4.1, and 4.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 5 and 5.1. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 6 and 6.1. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP_8
variable.comment: Computed from Form 148, questions 7 and 7.1. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: EST_8
variable.comment: Computed from form 148, questions 14, 15, 16, 17, 17.1 and 17.4.

variable.name: PRG_8
variable.comment: Computed from form 148, questions 14, 15, 18 and 18.1.

variable.name: HRT_8
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Progesterone use last year' and 'Estrogen use last year'.
